reviewText: These are the 12 Deva exercises that are written about in Taoist texts. It is not well recorded and the English subtitles are pretty hilarious. I had to go through it several times to get the information. Unfortunately, sometimes the translations did not make much sense. I appreciated seeing this version and of course a well seasoned practitioner is inspiring. You can view it on Amazon Prime video before buying if you are not sure it is right for you. He has several videos on AP. For me, it was a real find.
